OOC: Off scale? I'm not sure what that means, but it's probably an incorrec=
t statement. G1 had bloopers, but none as bad as Beast Wars making Rattrap =
in the wrong form during Dinobot's cremation.

So, you have every transform=
er to ever exist? Ironic, I have a monster truck in my back yard that can a=
ctually transform into Unicron and you can ride around in him into outer sp=
ace and even land on the moon like Neil Armstrong didn't! WHOOPEE!

Anyway,=
 the Transmetal on the Transmetals is plastic. Easily damaged plastic. The =
only advantage it have over G1's metal is that it's less expensive. Well, i=
t doesn't hurt as much when you drop it on your toe, too.

I wish I knew ev=
erything about G1. I do however, think I know enough to know what I'm talki=
ng about...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Hottie4u2have1@...=
 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, March 07, 2002 6:37 PM
  =
Subject: Re: G1


  ok its like this guys G1 i thought was the best transfo=
rmers even if it was 
  off scale more then the others but i think most of =
the characters in G1 was 
  cool especially since i have every transformer =
made so far yes from the 
  beginning and the new ones of transformers in d=
isguise.I have 4 of each one 
  and i kept 2 in boxes  put 1 up 4 a model o=
f each one and then 1 of each 2 
  mess around with and the odd thing is im=
 a girl yes a girl.My brothers also 
  have transformers but was never real=
ly a fan till Beast Wars.I have japanese 
  version of the shows and movies=
 and the US version of them.
  I'd just like to say im glad that i really d=
idnt have to get involved in this 
  fight.But i wanted to say one thing st=
op making stupid OOC posts please its 
  no need to fight about the way it =
was are its flaws its sorta old and i dont 
  like the complaints that some=
people are making.No names said though.So I 
  think I'm done with this pos=
t.Oh except can my character be the leader of the 
  Autobots please?
